metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18503 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When JavaScript is used to create and manipulate an audio buffer, a potentially exploitable crash may occur because of a compartment mismatch in some situations. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 65.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '65.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
